languages.text: Подо льдом скрыты некие темные объекты — вероятно, следы древней битвы. Ваш взгляд привлекает странный блеск.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Подо льдом видны остатки сражения, которое приходило N лет. Рядом что-то блестит (может)

languages.text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.
languages.original_text: Подо льдом скрыты некие темные объекты — вероятно, следы древней битвы. Ваш взгляд привлекает странный блеск.

traits.locale_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice — remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.
You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice — remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

languages.text: 你注意到冰层之下许多黑色物体，很可能是远古战争留下的痕迹。其中，某个古怪的发光物引起了你的注意。
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: 你注意到冰层之下许多黑色物体，很可能是远古战争留下的痕迹。其中，某个古怪的发光物引起了你的注意。

languages.text: Du bemerkst, dass unter dem Eis einige dunkle Objekte verborgen liegen. Vermutlich Überreste einer uralten Schlacht. Ein merkwürdiges Funkeln springt dir ins Auge.
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: Du bemerkst, dass unter dem Eis einige dunkle Objekte verborgen liegen. Vermutlich Überreste einer uralten Schlacht. Ein merkwürdiges Funkeln springt dir ins Auge.

languages.text: Distingues varios objetos ocultos bajo el hielo: probablemente sean los despojos de una batalla que se libró hace mucho. Algo brillante capta tu atención.
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: Distingues varios objetos ocultos bajo el hielo: probablemente sean los despojos de una batalla que se libró hace mucho. Algo brillante capta tu atención.

languages.text: Vous remarquez plusieurs choses sombres cachées sous la glace, probablement les vestiges d'une vieille bataille. Une étrange lueur attire votre attention.
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: Vous remarquez plusieurs choses sombres cachées sous la glace, probablement les vestiges d'une vieille bataille. Une étrange lueur attire votre attention.

languages.text: 氷の下に暗い物体がいくつも隠れているのに気づいた。恐らく古代の戦いの名残なのだろう。奇妙な光が目に飛び込んでくる。
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: 氷の下に暗い物体がいくつも隠れているのに気づいた。恐らく古代の戦いの名残なのだろう。奇妙な光が目に飛び込んでくる。

languages.text: Buzun altında gizlenmiş, koyu renkte birkaç nesne olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Büyük ihtimalle kadim bir çatışmanın kalıntıları. Tuhaf bir parıltı dikkatini çekiyor.
languages.original_text: You notice a number of dark objects that are hidden beneath the ice: remnants of an ancient battle, most likely. A strange glint catches your eye.

traits.locale_text: Buzun altında gizlenmiş, koyu renkte birkaç nesne fark ediyorsun. Büyük ihtimalle kadim bir savşın kalıntıları. Tuhaf bir parıltı dikkatini çekiyor.
